page.title: 04EXPANSION IN THE SAMPFORDS
page.content: Gt. Sampford is really expanding.Near the school there a fairly new road called Homebridge.There are eleven houses there.There were four council houses opposite the school but the council have pulled them down.In their place they put the foundations of three new buildings.There are to be six new council houses in all.This means alot to the village.However they now plan to build another twenty private houses behind the council houses.This will mean that more people will move into the village.Lots of people think that it will increase the the danger when the children leave the school.There will be more traffic on the roads.Now that the village is expanding some people want a speed limit but I do not think that it is necessary.
